summary: CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. MECHANIC TESTED AND GOT CODE- P0017 WHICH IS UNKNOWN TROUBLE CODE. THE MECHANIC SAID THERE WAS A RECALL ON THIS MOTOR IN OTHER VEHICLES DUE TO ENGINE SEIZING UP WITH THIS CODE. TWO DAYS AFTER THAT THE CAR IS NOT DRIVEABLE. WHEN I WENT OUT TO START THE CAR IT TOOK AWHILE TO TURN OVER AND WON'T START. THE CAR HAS NEW BATTERY AND ALTERNATOR WAS TESTED AND IS GOOD.  I WAS LUCKY AND WASN'T DRIVING WHEN ENGINE SEIZED UP. CAR ONLY HAS 104,000 MILES ON IT.
